text: Widget X costs $19.99 and includes wifi, gps.
Gadget Y is priced at $49.50, features: bluetooth, waterproofing
Device Z sells for $129.00 with premium materials and AI processing
The SuperPhone Pro Max retails for $899 and comes with 5G connectivity, wireless charging, face recognition, and a 108MP camera system.
Smart Watch Elite is available for $299.99. Key features include heart rate monitoring, GPS tracking, water resistance up to 50m, and 7-day battery life.
Gaming Laptop X1 costs $1,499 and features an RTX 4070 GPU, 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD, and RGB keyboard.
EcoFriendly Bottle priced at $24.95 includes BPA-free materials, double-wall insulation, and leak-proof design.
The Wireless Headphones Pro are $179 and offer noise cancellation, 30-hour battery, quick charge, and premium sound quality.
Home Security Camera costs $89.99 with night vision, motion detection, cloud storage, and mobile app control.
Electric Scooter Max sells for $649 and includes 25-mile range, foldable design, LED lights, and smartphone app.
